ModMetaData.name: Flags and Banners (Continued)

ModMetaData.description:
Update of Sadjuuks mod for RimWorld 1.1 https://steamcommunity.com/sharedfiles/filedetails/?id=1564928794
[img]https://raw.githubusercontent.com/emipa606/RimWorld-Wrapper/master/Notice.png[/img]

Non-steam version: https://github.com/emipa606/FlagsAndBanners
--- Original Description --- This is a Haku 10 request : Only the Flags and Banners from UN-Colony mod. They need the carpet research.
For complete mod : 1- UN-Colony : https://steamcommunity.com/sharedfiles/filedetails/?id=2019774245 2- UN-Furniture : https://steamcommunity.com/sharedfiles/filedetails/?id=2019774854
